title: Iced melon and berry soup
ingredients: ['1 large ripe green-fleshed melon, about 1.25 kg (2¾ lb)', 'juice of 1 lime', '3.5 cm (1½ in) piece fresh root ginger, peeled and grated', '150 g (5½ oz) blueberries', '120 ml (4 fl oz) freshly squeezed orange juice', '2 tbsp Greek-style yogurt', '150 g (5½ oz) raspberries or strawberries']
